attributes.action: Do not rollout Covid-19 vaccine passports
attributes.background: We want the Government to commit to not rolling out any e-vaccination status/immunity passport to the British public. Such passports could be used to restrict the rights of people who have refused a Covid-19 vaccine, which would be unacceptable. Cancel vaccine NHS app and for nightclub

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
